comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: I believe both of those above are only to address the funds stolen. which only affects the halving folks - in a way that is great as everyone else has been able to sweep their funds so far.I dont know how one would address lost "premium" - get proof of the purchase?for some that might be hard, but I keep all my purchases in a database so was quickly able to see I spent ~0.78 btc - being that I was able to pull .035 off the cards that makes my loss only ~0.75 plus the loan and cards never received etc.which for me is a huge loss as that is approx 14.5k USD right now. And I had a small collection - those with larger ones are probably look at easily 2x to 3x the loss that I have.

And I had a small collection - those with larger ones are probably look at easily 2x to 3x the loss that I have.I get that. But everyone is kicking and screaming; rightfully so. Just hope there are more individuals behind closed doors problem solving. A ton of money flows through sales here - there is potential to right all the wrongs. Even at a scaled level, but that requires a lot of community effort/commitment. For instance, every % of every sale for a year here on the forums could go to a fund to make sure those most impacted one day are righted. Again, a random example of a million things to be done.Point is, we can definitely overcome this, if we want to. I would prefer it to be in the form of a new collectible - because well thats the hobby. I don't hold a voice here though, so I'm just stirring the pot.
